author: Paul Rankin
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan over a medium heat and add the spring onion, garlic and chilli and cook for one minute. Add prawns and heat through. Transfer the prawns, spring onion, garlic and chilli onto a serving dish, scatter over the coriander leaves and drizzle with the lime juice.
ingredients: 20g/¾oz butter,  2 spring onions, sliced,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  ½ red chilli, seeds removed and finely chopped,  4 king prawns,cooked and peeled, tails left on,  small handful coriander leaves ½ lime, juice only
